attributes.action: No VAT on essentials e.g. clothes, cleansing products, toilet roll, etc
attributes.additional_details:
The Government brands these everyday essential items as luxury when it comes to VAT, yet they say how important it is to:
1. wash your hands with soap to stop diseases spreading
2. wear clothes to keep warm and because in public its the law
3. live in a clean environment to stop you getting ill

I ask the Government to remove VAT on these items as it is not justified because of these reasons
